name: That Mhu Khin
bio: My journey as an aspiring architect is fueled by a deep love for art and design. Though self-taught as an artist, I'm dedicated to continuous improvement in both design and illustration. My studies in sustainable architecture are a vital part of this, shaping my vision for a future where creativity and social responsibility go hand in hand. I find inspiration everywhere and actively engage my imagination to keep me focused on my goal of using architecture to connect with people and make a positive impact.
